page.title: 12A Typical School Day, 2
page.content: We come back in and start doing some maths or English. At 12.0 o'clock we have our lunch and it is usually a big dinner. After lunch we go out to play football as usual. When we come in we might have an assembly or carry on with the same subject, or do something else. It might be the Domesday Project or art. Sometimes we might work on some science or perhaps movement or music, it all depends on which day it is. After playtime Mr Gilmore might read the " Little Grey Men", which is our class story this term. Sometimes we might just read our books or choose what we want to do. At this time of the day Mr. Gilmore mostly works with people listening to them read or doing reading exercises. At the end of the day we put our chairs up and say the Lord's Prayer before going home.
